panels.description:
OpenTelemetry Int64Counter instruments are monotonic, meaning they only go up, and they represent a cumulative total either since:
- The start of your process
- The last exporter reset (if applicable).
They are not rate-based by default — there is no built-in time unit associated with the values.

==> we add a rate in grafana to compute the nb of call per duration
